email_content:
Hi Mark,

Here’s a concise overview of the Q2 Budget Forecast so you can move ahead with your planning:

• Raw material costs are projected to rise ~5% due to ongoing market volatility.
• The purchasing team has finished renegotiating supplier contracts; updated price lists for Q2 are now reflected in the budget model.
• We’re planning a gradual shift toward more sustainable materials, which could further influence costs later in the quarter.
• Contact information for all key suppliers has been refreshed to include the new account managers (see the Notion page for full details).
• Detailed figures, cost-center breakdowns and supporting spreadsheets are available in the “Q2 Budget Forecast” page on Notion.

Let me know if you have any questions or need additional context.

Best,
[Your Name]
